divs: sighting detailsafter planting some germinated morning glory seeds, i went out to the pipeline behind my house to smoke a cigarette. it was 4:00. i looked up at the sky where i saw yesterday's (6\18\2010) two ufos, not expecting to see anything but still curious. to my amazement, i saw a black sphere flying under the clouds. i watched it for a minute until it made it's way to the blue sky. once it reached the edge of the cloud, it vanished as if it could only be seen under a cloud. it flew in the same direction as my june 18th sightings, north east, though lower in altitude.
Summary: Black sphere flying under clouds vanished once it hit the blue sky
trends: There have been 5 other sightings in Centreville
There was one other sighting in Centreville on or around June 19th 2010
